title: Gallium
desc:
Post 875
*Of all elements to make ex, i made it Gallium. Why? Because i know literally nothing about it and all Wikipedia is giving me is that its like alumenium. So what im getting is that its aluminum but no one has heard of it.*
- Stick this in a thermometer, you gain control of the temperature of the game for the rest of the game.
- At any time, you may change the temperature of the game from anywhere between -459.67 F and 10740 F.
- If it is below freezing for water, all cards gain the frosted color and the ability: "Target a player", even if they already have an ability like it.
- If it is above the boiling point of water, all cards gain the inferno color and the ability: "May be played when someone targets you with a card.", even if they already have an ability like it.
- If another element is played, and the temperature is below its freezing point, it cannot be prevented from being played. If it is played at a liquid state, it is played normally, if it is a gas, if the card effects a target besides the player of the card, it effects all players besides themselves instead.
